com.seanchenxi.gwt.storage.client.cache
Interface StorageCache

public interface StorageCache

Interface for deferred binding implementation.

Default implementation is StorageMemoryCache

Do Object <--> String serialization/deserialization takes time, especially when there has frequent calls of StorageExt.get(StorageKey), performance problem will come out.

Using cache is always a good practice to reduce the number of serialization/deserialization.

Method Detail

clear

void clear()
Clear cache

containsValue

<T extends Serializable> boolean containsValue(T value)
Test if this Cache contains a value.

Type Parameters:
T - type of the given value
Parameters:
value - the value whose presence in this storage is to be tested
Returns:
true if this Cache contains a cached value for the specified key.

get

<T extends Serializable> T get(StorageKey<T> key)
Returns the value in this Cache associated with the specified key. or null if this Cache contains no cached value for the key.

Type Parameters:
T - type of value which will be returned
Parameters:
key - the key to a value in the Cache
Returns:
the cached value for the given key

put

<T extends Serializable> T put(StorageKey<T> key,
                               T value)
Cache the specified value with the specified key. If the cache previously contained a mapping for the key, the old value is replaced and returned.

Type Parameters:
T - type of given value
Parameters:
key - key with which the specified value is to be cached
value - value to be cached
Returns:
the previous value cached with key, or null if there was no cache value for key.

remove

<T extends Serializable> T remove(StorageKey<T> key)
Removes the cached value for the specified key from this cache if present.

Type Parameters:
T - type of given value
Parameters:
key - key whose value is to be removed from the cache
Returns:
the previous value cached with key, or null if there was no cache value for key.
